review: Visited doctor for diabetes control.  He was very calm and listen to all my problems. Suggested lifestyle modification and diet changes. I was on 3 tablets before visiting Dr Lakshmikanth and now my sugar is so controlled after his treatment . Now I am just on diet and exercise without tablets .  It feels like a new beginning. I recommend doctor for diabetes and related issues. The staff at clinic are so cheerful and helpful

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We visited wisden clinics for my father s diabetes treatment . It was very high HbA1c was 9 before we met Dr Lakshmikanth and then took treatment for 4 months as prescribed by dr Lakshmikanth and the values reduced to 6.6 and we are very happy with the treatment because the sugar level was always increasing . Doctor also treated nerve problem  and other diabetic problems. I recommend him for diabetes treatment. Nice staff and clean clinic .

tags: None
review:
Great for in person and short term treatments, but not reliable at all when things get serious and in SOS situations.

He is super friendly in person and even diagnoses the issue really well. I went to him because of high fever and he was able to hypothesize that it's Dengue, post which I got a test done. The next day when my fever hit 103° and I kept reaching out to his clinic for guidance* * *** ******* *** *** ******

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
******* **** ****** ** *** *********** *** ** ********** ********** ********** ** **** ******* I waited over 16 hours just to get a follow-up on my dengue report. Even after discovering that I had dengue, the staff didn't bother to share any updates from the doctor. Despite calling seven times, I received no response. 

*** ******* **** ** ****** ********* The staff clearly doesn't care about their patients' well-being. Save yourself the trouble and find another clinic—this place is a nightmare. Do not go here if you value your health and time.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I have had stable HBA1C levels (between 6-7)since my diabetes diagnosis three years ago. Wanted to reduce medication hence I visited him because he has good reviews on Practo! ***** ******* 1.5 months of his medication and my HBA1C level is at 9.5!! * **** **** * ****** ***** ** ********* ** *** ******** ** *** **** ** **** **** ** ******** **** *******

tags: None
review:
Dr. Lakshmikant was a saviour. I went in with barely being able to move a muscle, that's how bad the joint pain was and I was also suffering from very high fever (101-102), very bright red rashes all over my body and some traces of acute Tonsillitis. The rashes part was very baffling to me, but the Dr. patiently listened to my entire case history, previous illness, etc and decoded one by one what could possibly be the causal agent in my case. He gave 3options and explained why certain lab tests were necessary and why he is starting me off with certain medications even before the lab results came out. His diagnosis was amazingly on point, very very thorough in what he does, extremely patient and considers it his duty to explain things to his patients so that everyone is aware.
I would 100% recommend him to everyone as it's rare to find such doctors who are so nice. 

Thanks again very very much Dr. Have a great life ahead!
